text: Calanthe yueana is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China, known from Hubei and Sichuan Provinces.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China, v 25 p 303, 峨边虾脊兰 e bian xia ji lan, Calanthe yuana China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Calanthe yuana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded 20 August 2007. == References == Category:Endemic orchids of China Category:Endangered plants yueana Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1936
title: Calanthe yueana
